body: He's chinese, he got offended one time by people telling him that his scans were low quality so he decided that instead of stopping scanning he'd put effort into making them useless.

can someone explain to me,why did the chap who scanned this even doing it? i mean,if you're just having fun,i get it. but why 2,000 of it? maybe to provide option to international community that's interested in some of his low scan so that they can get options to scan and translate it themselves?
